DOC.detailed_description: Registry interventional Study-proved Strategy ( BIC-8 ) use Copeptin Troponin Early Rule-Out Acute Myocardial Infarction ( AMI ) Patients Suspected Acute Coronary Syndrome ( ACS ) low-to intermediate risk profile . Primary objective : To monitor safety early rule-out strategy use combine test copeptin troponin admission patient sign symptom suggestive ACS low- intermediate risk profile , discharge move another hospital test copeptin troponin negative ( define copeptin 10 pmol/l cardiac troponin 99th percentile URL ) . Secondary objective : - To monitor routine application early rule-out strategy , patient characteristic , risk profile patient test copeptin troponin admission , irrespective biomarker test result - To monitor diagnosis , clinical course outcome patient test copeptin troponin admission
